types:type.name: responsePokeApi
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type responsePokeApi = {| experience: String, name: String, ability: String, sysdate: String, ability2: String |} {"example": "{\\\"experience\\\":\\\"ola\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"a\\\",\\\"ability\\\":\\\"todos\\\",\\\"sysdate\\\":\\\"sysdate\\\",\\\"ability2\\\":\\\"ability2\\\"}"}

types:type.name: jsonDB
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsonDB = {| base_experience: String, name: String, ability: String, sysdate: String, ability2: String |} {"example": "{\\\"base_experience\\\":\\\"ola\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"a\\\",\\\"ability\\\":\\\"todos\\\",\\\"sysdate\\\":\\\"sysdate\\\",\\\"ability2\\\":\\\"ability2\\\"}"}
